info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Warm-hearted Woodsman
collection.openText: This is a forest full of hearts. No matter how many he cuts down, the forest still remains dense.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When an employee with Temperance Level 3 or higher completed their work, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When an employee enters the unit while the Counter is at 0, they will immediately die. Then, the Abnormality will escape.
